remoteClasses.name: Composite
remoteClasses.doc: A :rom:cls:`Hub` that mixes the :rom:attr:`MediaType.AUDIO` stream of its connected sources and constructs a grid with the :rom:attr:`MediaType.VIDEO` streams of its connected sources into its sink

properties.name: outputResolution
properties.doc: Set the output resolution of video composition

params.name: mediaPipeline
params.doc: the :rom:cls:`MediaPipeline` to which the dispatcher belongs
